name: SOITEC
goal: Soitec is a manufacturer of substrates (materials) for microelectronics industry based on technologies which are based on European patents. We are at the bottom of electronics value chain. Our goal is more European innovation and the adoption of our technologies worldwide by chip manufacturers.
interests: Business and Industry, Digital economy and society, Research and innovation
euInitiatives:
ECSEL joint undertaking
IPCEI (Important Project of Common European Interest) nano electronics
